What are the treatments for Friedreich ataxia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Friedreich ataxia:  - Friedreich's Ataxia Research Alliance: Clinical Care Guidelines  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Friedreich Ataxia  - Genetic Testing Registry: Friedreich ataxia 1  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Friedreich's Ataxia  - MedlinePlus Ency
